Email Conversation Export
=========================

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CJI9J5S_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Hinde Mokrim <Hinde.Mokrim@loccitane.me>
CC: Milan Milosavic <Milan.Milosavic@loccitane.me>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-25 10:09
Subject: Claim adjustment - L'Occitane City Walk - 15/04/2024
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hinde,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Please note that we have concluded the claim for L’Occitane Café - Citywalk with regards to the April Rain damages. Below is the breakdown of the claim computation:

 

Physical Damage                                  AED 16,444

BI Loss (2.5 days closure)                             AED 33,407

Total Loss:                               AED 49,851

Less Policy Excess (10%):                        (AED 4,985)

Net Loss                                               AED 44,866

 

Until the transfer is received, appreciate if you could consider the attached discharge as the basis for accrual of the receivable amount due in favor of L’Occitane Café - Citywalk to record the revenue for this fiscal year.

 

Once the transfer is made, will share with you the related document.

 

Appreciate your support as always.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

	
 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/>

chunks.text:
Please note that we have concluded the claim for L’Occitane Café - Citywalk with regards to the April Rain damages. Below is the breakdown of the claim computation:

 

Physical Damage                                  AED 16,444

BI Loss (2.5 days closure)                             AED 33,407

Total Loss:                               AED 49,851

Less Policy Excess (10%):                        (AED 4,985)

Net Loss                                               AED 44,866

 

Until the transfer is received, appreciate if you could consider the attached discharge as the basis for accrual of the receivable amount due in favor of L’Occitane Café - Citywalk to record the revenue for this fiscal year.

 

Once the transfer is made, will share with you the related document.

 

Appreciate your support as always.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000
